summary: Frontend UI Admin Testing Complete - All 10 features PASSED. Login, Dashboard, Deliveries (list+detail+filters+pagination+actions), Clients (list+edit+entity filter), Commandes (list+create modal+edit+progress bars), Settings (denylist+simulation+calendars), Navigation (sidebar collapse+logout) all working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ Login form working with proper email/password auth and redirect to /admin/dashboard
✅ Dashboard displays all stats: pending_csv(0), ready_to_send(473), sent(160), failed(0), total(633), billable(159), rejected(1), sending(0)
✅ Entity breakdown cards for ZR7 (160 sent, 245 ready, 0 failed, 159 billable, 1 rejected) and MDL (0 sent, 228 ready, 0 failed, 0 billable, 0 rejected)
✅ Deliveries list shows all columns: Date, Entity, Client, Produit, Status, Outcome, Sent To, Attempts, Actions
✅ Deliveries filters working: Entity dropdown, Status dropdown, stat pills clickable to filter
✅ Deliveries pagination working: 13 pages (50 per page), prev/next buttons, page indicator
✅ Deliveries actions: View, Download CSV, Send (for ready_to_send), Resend (for sent) all functional
✅ Delivery detail shows delivery info, lead info, rejection info (if rejected), and actions
✅ Reject modal opens with reason input, cancel/confirm buttons, validates reason required
✅ Rejected delivery shows reason, rejected_by, rejected_at; lead status correctly shows 'new'
✅ Clients page loads both ZR7 (3) and MDL (5) clients, entity filter works
✅ Clients inline edit: email, api_endpoint, auto_send toggle, active toggle with save/cancel
✅ Commandes page loads 13 commandes from both entities
✅ Commandes create modal: entity, produit, client, departements, quota, lb_max, priorite fields
✅ Commandes inline edit working with active toggle
✅ Commandes progress bars display correctly (green/amber/red based on quota usage)
✅ Settings page: denylist domains textarea, simulation mode toggle + email input, ZR7/MDL calendars
✅ Day toggles (Lun-Dim) working for both ZR7 and MDL calendars
✅ Navigation sidebar with all 5 links working, active state highlighting correct
✅ Sidebar collapse button works (shows icons only when collapsed)
✅ Logout button redirects to login page and clears session
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 10 frontend features tested and working. The admin UI is fully functional with proper backend integration. Key data: 633 total deliveries, 473 ready_to_send, 160 sent, 1 rejected, 159 billable. 8 clients (3 ZR7 + 5 MDL), 13 commandes. Simulation mode is ON with energiebleuciel@gmail.com as simulation email. Delivery calendar has Mon-Fri enabled for both entities.

deliveries_actions.download_csv: Button visible for deliveries with CSV

commandes_page.progress_bar: Shows delivered percentage with color coding
